content.rendered:
Issue-specific, industry-driven 

CAGBC’s Innovation Series explores the latest solutions and strategies to address technical and market challenges experienced in the design, construction and operation of sustainable buildings.

The Innovation Series encourages dialogue, leveraging our collective knowledge and experience to advance high-performing and resilient buildings, communities, and cities.

Each year, CAGBC hosts sessions around leading-edge solutions and strategies. The sessions include educational presentations and moderated panels with Canada’s leading subject matter experts, in-depth discussions, and opportunities to explore exciting projects. 

April 14. More Than Being Green – CIBC SQUARE.

Register now
